document_data.title: Shadows of Change
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Shadows of Change''''' is a tournament module in the [[Living Jungle]] organized play campaign for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] and the first 3{{rd}} edition Living Jungle adventure, part III of the ''[[Lacerial Trilogy]]'', published in 2000.

{{Quote|''The lacerials are dying. New spirits of Earth, Air, Fire, and Water move about the land. Enemies have become allies while old allies are suspect – and everything has changed. The Living Jungle's first D&D 3{{rd}} Edition adventure, as well as chapter 3 in the Lacerial Trilogy. An adventure for heroes of all levels.''|}}
